```{r}
library(dplyr)
countNA <- function(data){
   x <- data%>%select(everything()) %>% summarise_all(funs(sum(is.na(.))))
   x
}
```

```{r}
head(VAERSDATA)
countNA(VAERSDATA)

head(VAERSSYMPTOMS)
countNA(VAERSSYMPTOMS)

head(VAERSVAX)

head(vaccinations)
countNA(vaccinations)
```
